title: PERMANENTLY BANNED
body: Hey Riot, I would really like to get back my League Of Legends account. I made a lot of efforts to get into gold elo. I love this game and I respect it also, but when I play ranked, some people just feeds intentionally, they troll, and it makes me mad. Like me too I want to climb elos, but some people literally doesn't let me. And I also paid a lot of money on this game, so I would like to get back my account for that also. During this moment, I was also gonna get the new skin of Yasuo, Nightbringer one. Well, I am sorry for being a bit toxic, but now I would like to get back my account please Riot.

replies.body: I've got your account pulled up, and I do see where your account had been finally escalated to a permanent ban due to some of the things you had said. You're more than welcome to reach out to our player behavior team for more context in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you need.
